event.title: I Love Free Software Day @ Internet Archive Europe in Amsterdam, Netherlands

body.p: Come enjoy a simultaneous Dutch and English book reading of of Ada & Zangemann, a tale for kids (and adults) about the importance of hacking and open technologies. After the reading, we will have a more topical round-table about Free Software manteinance as care work, together with Mayel de Borniol from Bonfire, a modular Fediverse project co-designed with communities.
